body_html:
You can already achieve it now. For instance,

>>> rnn = nn.RNN(10,10,2)  # build an RNN
>>> nn.utils.weight_norm(rnn, 'weight_hh_l0')  # apply weight_norm to any particular weight you want
body_text:
You can already achieve it now. For instance,
>>> rnn = nn.RNN(10,10,2)  # build an RNN
>>> nn.utils.weight_norm(rnn, 'weight_hh_l0')  # apply weight_norm to any particular weight you want
body:
You can already achieve it now. For instance,
```
>>> rnn = nn.RNN(10,10,2)  # build an RNN
>>> nn.utils.weight_norm(rnn, 'weight_hh_l0')  # apply weight_norm to any particular weight you want
```
